name: Tower of Pertho
description:
Tower of Pertho is a procedurally generated single player dungeon crawler hack and slash game set within the cursed rooms of the Tower of Pertho. There is loot to find, merchants to buy and sell from, abilities to upgrade and bosses to fight! Do you have the stomach to brave through the dynamic yet disorientating level environments? Go on. See if you can survive the Tower of Pertho.

Within the ensuing invasion of the Northeast coast of England, a Viking warrior of no honourable bearing loses her life. To obtain her ascension to the mighty halls of Valhalla, she must ascend the tower and battle all that lies within. She must look upon herself and truly become a warrior of merit and quality.

Her destiny now lies in Valhalla’s halls, the mythical afterlife that awaits beyond the shimmering veil between life and death. But danger does not cease, for Astrid must earn her place, and only by ascending to the top of the Hallowed Tower can she be embraced by her kin. But terror and foes lurk around every corner, her journey will take her to the heights of glory... and the pits of despair. The choice of her fate is yours to decide. Fight well.
